story.title: We hear you üëç‚Äî33-month-old
story.subheadline: Toddler=sunshine mixed with a little hurricane.
story.content:
Anyone else feel like their houseplants are sometimes better listeners than their toddlers? üå± Those moments can be so, so hard. We hear you mama (even if you kiddo doesn't seem to). We promise that you're getting through to them. Just keep on' keepin' on. You've got this.

XO,

#TeamMotherly

P.S. When the keepin' on gets tough, book a massage from your phone on spafinder.com.
